name: Rising Runner
description: Rising Runner is a puzzle-action game, your aim is to guide Anette Harper through Purgatory to reclaim her soul! Features a level editor to make your own levels!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or better Processor: At least 3.0GHz single-core CPU Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Any hardware accelerated from 2005 or later. Storage: 15 MB available space Sound Card: Any OpenAL/Windows compatible soundcard.
